snippet: President Obama has a number of speaking styles in his repertoire, from soaring oratory to serious policy wonkishness, withering sarcasm and cocky defensiveness. For an interview with Vice News released Monday, he went with optimistic paternalism.
abstract: President Obama has a number of speaking styles in his repertoire, from soaring oratory to serious policy wonkishness, withering sarcasm and cocky defensiveness. For an interview with Vice News released Monday, he went with optimistic paternalism.

headline.main: Obama Wades Into Marijuana Debate in Vice Interview
